name: The Apothecary Just South of Wellspring
name_original: The Apothecary Just South of Wellspring
description:
The original idea I had for this game was to work extremely hard on the Start menus, with everything from fancy animations to character creation, but when you actually go to play the game, it shows you an error saying something along the lines of "Game has yet to be developed... sorry for this inconvenience". 

Ultimately, this was not the game that I wanted to make.

Instead, I made a game that is an isometric, turn based game (neither of which were things I had done before) where you grow some sunflowers and apples, sell stuff, and fight slimes. 

I have quite a few further plans that I am quite excited about, and I've really enjoyed making the game so far.  I hope you enjoy it as much as I have enjoyed making it!
